Hello, I have got problem. I am writing c# application which get nmea data from gps receiver, parse that and display points on the gmap - in real time as markers, point after point. But performance is not good. When I get about 300 points, application is slowly and slowly, in the end it's freeze. I am getting data from RichTextBox with event when it's change. When I have a lot of points, RichTextBox is slowly too.. Display a point is realised by:

overlayOne.Markers.Add...,
gMapControl1.Overlays.Add(overlayOne);
gMapControl1.ZoomAndCenterMarkers("OverlayOne");
gMapControl1.Refresh();

And it's in every event.. It refresh whole map everytime when I add new marker..

Can someone write me a universal code, which is quicker?

Thanks.
check the demo, there is real time flight and vehicle visualization, pretty fast, handles thousands of markers
